original_title: Opeth: Garden Of The Titans - Live At Red Rocks Amphitheatre
overview: Filmed and recorded in 2017 at Red Rocks Amphitheatre outside of Denver, 'Garden Of The Titans - Opeth Live At Red Rocks Amphitheatre' is a 2-CD/Blu-ray/DVD release (along with several colour vinyl formats) consisting of tracks spanning the band's nearly 30 year career.
title: Opeth: Garden Of The Titans - Live At Red Rocks Amphitheatre
